attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal contained in the Digital Britain report to cease broadcasting radio on FM is a retrograde step. The cost to the UK populace in replacing all their radios with DAB radios will be prohibitive.  The quality of DAB is inferior to FM. The service coverage of DAB is inferior to FM.  DAB is not an upgrade.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
